Name: Kasha Blue
TDoR list ref: tdor.info/18 Jun 2005/Antonio Sydney Wright aka Kasha Blue
Description:
Kasha Blue was reportedly stabbed in the chest by Michael Major after an argument. 

Kasha was a hairstylist who lived as a woman and had spent years working at a salon. On the night she was killed she was heading to her car shortly after 9pm, having finished work at a nearby salon, when Michael Major allegedly heckled Kasha about her partner. Words ensued, and Major pulled a knife, stabbing Kasha in the chest. After the stabbing, Major was heard to say, “I got f----- blood on me” before running down an alley.
